question: Which was the first bout recognized by the World Boxing Association?
option1: Jack Dempsey-Georges Carpentier Heavyweight Championship bout
answer: Jack Dempsey-Georges Carpentier Heavyweight Championship bout
explanation: The World Boxing Association can be traced back to the original National Boxing Association, organized in 1921. The first bout it recognized was the Jack Dempsey-Georges Carpentier Heavyweight Championship bout in New Jersey.
